* Iron Raptor looks at FZ for a moment, her voice slightly harsh.*

" See nothing funny about this."

* So much for being nice. Guess there was just no pleaseing some bots.
She crossed her arms and leaned back, also looking out at the field.*

" I've already told then to stop firing and come to me. It's up to them if 
they want to save a comrad, I've done all I can. I need their help now."

* Her voice was flat now, since any emotion that she might show towards the 
man was over.*
